alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sullivan, northwestern Hillsborough and southwestern Merrimack Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hillsborough, or near Henniker, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Concord, Henniker, Hopkinton, New Boston, Antrim, Canterbury, Hancock, Bradford, Francestown, Bennington, Windsor, Deering, Warner, Hillsborough, Weare, Goffstown, Bow, Boscawen, Dunbarton and Webster. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 4 and 24. Interstate 93 between mile markers 47 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Merrimack; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough
